name: CANNA CARES
slogan: Direct to Consumer Medical CBD Brand
description: Range of Medical CBD products and Medical Cannabis Formulations designed to specifically help our target audience.

jobs.title: Head of Marketing
jobs.description: Looking for a Social Media, Content Creator, who is keen on establishing themselves in the CBD market.
jobs.descriptionHtml: Looking for a Social Media, Content Creator, who is keen on establishing themselves in the CBD market.

jobs.title: Influencer marketing assistant
jobs.description:
-	Key responsibilities include reaching out to micro influencers marketers, with a key following of health and wellness seekers, botanical alternative medicine influencers, mum influencers, sport and nutrition influencers, chronic pain influencers, reviewers. Finding influencers who have a loyal following reviewing products.
-	Using a influencer marketing platform to understand the market rate for similar influencers in the sector.
-	Taking and helping influencers to review our product range across all their social platforms, including taking a select handful of carefully picked affiliates and helping them conduct month long reviews of their journey with cannacares products via YouTube and IGTV.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
• Key responsibilities include reaching out to micro influencers marketers, with a key following of health and wellness seekers, botanical alternative medicine influencers, mum influencers, sport and nutrition influencers, chronic pain influencers, reviewers. Finding influencers who have a loyal following reviewing products.
  • Using a influencer marketing platform to understand the market rate for similar influencers in the sector.
  • Taking and helping influencers to review our product range across all their social platforms, including taking a select handful of carefully picked affiliates and helping them conduct month long reviews of their journey with cannacares products via YouTube and IGTV.
